      • registerDataSer

        public boolean registerDataSer(java.lang.String url)
                        throws java.rmi.RemoteException

        Specified by:

      • getStatus

        public IntUserStatus getStatus(java.lang.String user,
                               java.lang.String passwd)
        return the object of IntUserStatus if parameters are valid. if the Username and Password is not valid then null will be return.
        Specified by:
        getStatus in interface IntMainSer
        Parameters:
        user - username
        passwd - password
        Returns:
        the Object of IntUserStatus if the username and password is valid.
